alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Frederick; Northern Baltimore; Northwest Harford; Southeast Harford; Southern Baltimore (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 14 at 6:08AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT CARROLL COUNTY IN NORTH CENTRAL MARYLAND...CENTRAL HARFORD COUNTY IN NORTHERN MARYLAND...NORTHERN FREDERICK COUNTY IN NORTH CENTRAL MARYLAND AND BALTIMORE COUNTIES IN NORTHERN MARYLAND... At 605 AM EST, snow showers were located along a line extending from near Rouzerville to near Taneytown to near Timonium. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. Snowfall will coat the ground causing slippery conditions. Visibility will be locally reduced to one mile at times. Be prepared for sudden changes in visibility when travelling along with snow covered and slippery surfaces. Drive slowly when encountering snow showers early this morning. Interstate 83 will be impacted by this as well as portions of Interstate 95 northeast of Baltimore. Locations impacted include... Pikesville, Middle River, Cockeysville, Westminster, Aberdeen, Thurmont, Emmitsburg, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Towson, Bel Air South, Randallstown, Parkville, Owings Mills, Bel Air North, Eldersburg, Carney, Perry Hall, Reisterstown, Rossville and Mays Chapel.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Frederick; Northern Baltimore; Northwest Harford; Southeast Harford; Southern Baltimore
